com.adNomus.library

Class AdNomusControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adNomus.library.AdNomusControl

  • public class AdNomusControl
extends java.lang.Object
    This is part of the AdNomus SDK for Android. This class provides the public methods for the library usage. It also stores all the information that sdk needs from the user

      • getStandardWebViewFromContent

        public android.webkit.WebView getStandardWebViewFromContent(java.lang.String content,
                                                            AdNomusControl.AdType adType,
                                                            AdNomusControl.AdSize adSize)
        Parameters:
        content - The string with the content you need to find relative ad for.
        adType - The type of the ad
        adSize - The size of the ad
        Returns:
        a webview with the standard ad that you'll show in your app. you need to set a content, the type and the size of the ad. Use addView() to add the returned view to your project's view.

      • getRandomWebView

        public android.webkit.WebView getRandomWebView()
        Returns:
        a Standard add view without required any parameters. You don't reclaim the power of our AI system that way, this is just for testing. Use getStandardWebViewFromContent for content relevant results.

      • getStandardWebViewFromContentUrl

        public android.webkit.WebView getStandardWebViewFromContentUrl(java.lang.String contentUrl,
                                                               AdNomusControl.AdType adType,
                                                               AdNomusControl.AdSize adSize)
        Parameters:
        contentUrl - The url with the content you need a relative ad for
        adType - The type of the ad
        adSize - The size of the ad
        Returns:
        a webview with the standard ad that you'll show in your app. you need to set the url the type and the size of the ad.

      • getStandardWebViewFromContext

        public android.webkit.WebView getStandardWebViewFromContext(java.lang.String context,
                                                            AdNomusControl.AdType adType,
                                                            AdNomusControl.AdSize adSize)
        Parameters:
        context - The context String
        adType - The type of the ad
        adSize - The size of the ad
        Returns:
        requests an ad of standard format and manages ad rendering and reporing

      • getNativeAdFromContent

        public void getNativeAdFromContent(java.lang.String content,
                                   AdNomusControl.AdType adType,
                                   AdNomusControl.AdSize adSize,
                                   AdnomusNativeListener nativeListener)
        This function sets the given variables in AdNomusAd class (super class of NativeAd). After the call of that function you need to implement an AdnomusNativeListener, overwrite the didReceiveAdResponse method and set the native add into an ImageView. To take the url you need to have the nativeAd.getAd().getImageUrl()
        Parameters:
        content - The string with the content you need to find relative ad for
        adType - The type of the ad
        adSize - The size of the ad
        nativeListener - A native listener instance

      • getNativeAdFromContentUrl

        public void getNativeAdFromContentUrl(java.lang.String contentUrl,
                                      AdNomusControl.AdType adType,
                                      AdNomusControl.AdSize adSize,
                                      AdnomusNativeListener nativeListener)
        It requests of a native format given the contentUrl which is a public url that gives access to the content AdNomus will use for content analysis, the image size and a native listener
        Parameters:
        contentUrl - The url with the content you need a relative ad for
        adType - The type of the ad
        adSize - The size of the ad
        nativeListener - A native listener instance

      • getNativeAdFromContext

        public void getNativeAdFromContext(java.lang.String context,
                                   AdNomusControl.AdType adType,
                                   AdNomusControl.AdSize adSize,
                                   AdnomusNativeListener nativeListener)
        It requests of a native format given a context, the ad size and the native listener
        Parameters:
        context - The context String
        adType - The type of the ad
        adSize - The size of the ad
        nativeListener - A native listener instance

      • getAdContextFromContent

        public AdContext getAdContextFromContent(java.lang.String content,
                                         AdNomusControl.AdType adType,
                                         AdNomusControl.AdSize adSize,
                                         AdnomusContextListener contextListener)
        It creates a new advert context for future use given the content as String, the type, the size and the listener . When you take the object you need to implement an AdnomusContextListener, overwrite the onContextReady method and set the object on a webView
        Parameters:
        content - The string with the content you need to find relative ad for
        adType - The type of the ad
        adSize - The size of the ad
        contextListener - A context listener instance
        Returns:
        an adContext object

      • getAdContextFromContentUrl

        public AdContext getAdContextFromContentUrl(java.lang.String contentUrl,
                                            AdNomusControl.AdType adType,
                                            AdNomusControl.AdSize adSize,
                                            AdnomusContextListener contextListener)
        It creates a new advert context for future use given the contentUrl which is a public url that gives access to the content AdNomus will use for content analysis.
        Parameters:
        contentUrl - The url with the content you need a relative ad for
        adType - The type of the ad
        adSize - The size of the ad
        contextListener - A context listener instance
        Returns:
        an adContext object
